message:
Running command: cd /workspace/SheepVibes && git add . && git commit -m "fix: replace inline styles with CSS classes for modal visibility

- Updated modal CSS to use .is-active class for controlling visibility
- Removed inline style="display: none;" from HTML
- Modified JavaScript to use classList.add/remove instead of style.display
- This addresses the medium priority review comment about mixing concerns
- Now uses proper separation of structure (HTML), presentation (CSS), and behavior (JavaScript)

Co-authored-by: openhands <openhands@all-hands.dev>"

message.content: Now let me commit and push these fixes for the CSS class usage:
